wikipedia_page.main: Martin Clark (born 12 September 1970) is an English former footballer who last played for Northern Premier League side Chorley, retiring after a string of knee injuries in February 2010. Clark played for Crewe Alexandra and Rotherham United in The Football League.

response: *Martin Clark (snooker player) (born 1968), former English professional snooker player
*Martin Clarke (born 1987), Gaelic and Australian rules footballer
